# Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
## Overview
**Aura** moderate abjuration; **CL** 8th

**Slot** neck

**Price** 35,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This silver amulet protects the wearer from scrying and magical location just as a *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]* spell does. If a divination spell is attempted against the wearer, the caster of the divination must succeed on a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) against a DC of 19 (as if the wearer had cast *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]* on herself ).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*

**Cost** 17,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 500
